column1: #Text=The post-office bubble, it will be seen, has burst; he blessing to the poor, who could neither read nor nite, even if they had time, has vanished, and a new Sign of stupidity and braggadocio has been made manifest.
#Text=Goulburn, in the House of Commons, Addled Mr.
#Text=Rowland Hills vast absurdity into holes, the ministerial papers w ere loud in their abuse of such illiberally.
#Text=The farce went on; not only was Mr.

#Text=Hill honoured", but salaried; and not only that, his plan was matured even to the sticking of bits of paper on the letters with gum, and paste, and wafers, &C, details so puzzled the wiseacres of Downing-street, that they actually advertised rewards to anybody who c°uld help them in their arrangements as to how to stick best and longest.
